Hi there I just wanna create a report using ReportRunner in the ReportEngine and pass it a parameter. As you can see from below I am sending a parameter named input_date ,but the program complains that the parameter has not been set (cannot be null). Without parameters, it works fine and renders the html as well as pdf... my problem has to do with passing a parameter in which it doesn't seem to get picked up by the ReportRunner class. The input parameter is of type string, so it is not a date formatting issue. Below is the error I'm getting when running the report. Below that, I also attached my report design. Please note that this input parameter is of type string. C:\software\birt-runtime-2_1_0\ReportEngine>genReport.bat -o salome20051111.html -p input_date=20051111 samples\renewalsForDayByChannel.rptdesign C:\software\birt-runtime-2_1_0\ReportEngine>ECHO off 2006/09/29 08:59:26 org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.EngineTask validateS calarParameter SEVERE: Parameter input_date doesnt allow a null value. 2006/09/29 08:59:26 org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner runAndRender Report SEVERE: Some required parameter values are not set or set to incompatible data type. org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: Some required parameter values are not set or set to incompatible data type. at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRenderTask.java:146) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.runAndRenderReport(ReportRunner.java:237) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.execute(ReportRunner.java:162) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.main(ReportRunner.java:118) rptdesign: Eclipse BIRT Designer Version 2.1.0.N20060628-1351 Build <20060628-1537> in Copyright (c) 2006 <<Your Company Name here>> D:/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui_2.1.0.N20060628-1351/resources/payments1.rptlibrary payments1 static string text-box Unformatted html new Date()]]> DATE params["DATE"] row["pf_ch_date"]

according to the Command line usage, BIRT user should type as follow if post a parameter in report design:

-p "paramName=paramValue"

so, the correct command line in your case is:

genReport.bat -o salome20051111.html -p "input_date=20051111" samples\renewalsForDayByChannel.rptdesign

set it INVALID and update the USAGE of ReportRunner.

traces.message: Some required parameter values are not set or set to incompatible data type.
